description:
Rin is the leader of the Toba island pirates, standing in for her ill father. She hopes to find a mermaid in order to cure her father`s sickness with its flesh. Most often seen in rough clothes and armour, she is actually quite beautiful when she takes the time to dress up and go to town.
She falls in love with Yuuta, who decides to stay on the island if he can become a mortal. In the end, he decides to move on as he does not want to have a mortal wife while he remains immortal.
name: Rin
